page.title: 05LAW AND ORDER BRAE
page.content: Police in Brae The Brae Police Office is a modern building in the centre of Brae.It is manned by 1 sergeant and 6 constables. They all belong to the Northern Constabulary.Their headquarters are in Inverness. We see the Police at night driving around Brae in one of their two Ford Escorts.They come to school in the summer time to teach us cycling proficiency.They also come to school at other times of the year to warn us of dangerous things such as fireworks, road safety and going with strangers. We have no courts,no sheriff or lawyers in our area.
